string.value: To Fool a Liar

Wanted: A great liar? Apparently, #b#p9010010##k is looking for explorers that can help protect Maplers from monsters, and she is looking for a great liar... What is that supposed be? I better go talk to #p9010010# right now.

#p9010010# mentioned that #r#p9010012##k was hatching a plan to transform into a human and pull some pranks on unsuspecting Maplers, and she wants to prevent that from happening by having him sniff the Flower Petals of Transformation, which will prevent him from transforming altogether. But she warned that #p9010012# wouldn't believe it if I just gave it to him as is, so we have to trick him into believing that the petals will actually help him transform into a human much easier... There are plenty of #p9010012#s #baround #m200000000##k, though... how am I going to tell which one is really him?\n\n#i4031584##t4031584# #b#c4031584#/10#k
I managed to give #t4031584# to #p9010012#. This will prevent him from transforming into a human for an hour, right?

I know lying is not the right thing to do, but... sometimes, white lies are required in the best interest of everyone... like right now! Do you want to know what it is? I will tell you what my plan is if you are willing to help me.

#r#p9010012##k has been constantly surveying the world of Maple, looking for ways to create chaos. Lately, he's been looking for the leaves that will help him transform into a human being. It's obvious he wants to do it so he can take advantage of some unsuspecting Maplers!

In order to stop him from doing just that, we'll need to make him sniff #b10 #t4031584#s#k instead. Those leaves will prevent him from turning into a human being. The problem is, despicable characters like him are always suspicious of others, because they know firsthand that deception is everything, which means, it's up to you to convince him that #t4031584# is actually the leaf of transformation, okay?

Since he's looking to cause trouble in towns, I am 100% confident that he's somewhere near #m200000000#. You'll need to spot a suspicious-looking #p9010012# and hand him #t4031584#. These leaves are easily found, since most monsters carry it with them, but it's only good for one hour, so if you can help me again afterwards, please come back after one hour.
What? You don't want to lie? Hmmm... you look like someone that can really help us out.

Hey, aren't you a human being? What's a human being doing here? Something smells fishy here...? 
#L0##b You're the one that's planning on attacking the Maplers, right? I can't let you do that! 
#L1# Hey, I am just here to help you out. 
#L2# I... actually... um... like you. I've been meaning to say that.

Help? What help? How can I trust you? You look creepy!
#L0##b What are you saying? That's not true! Look at me in the eyes! My innocent-looking eyes...!~ 
#L1# Who's calling me creepy-looking? You look creepier than me! 
#L2# Hmph... honestly, I've been hearing that for a while...

Hmmm... fine, I am still not sure about this, but I'll hear you out. What do you want from me?
#L0##b I heard you were looking for something that will turn you into a human being, so I brought the best transformation item out there. 
#L1# I thought it was interesting to see a monster talk, so.... 
#L2# I am going to make sure you will never turn into a human being!

What? You brought the stuff needed to transform? Thanks!... wait, you really thought I meant that? Are you kidding me? How am I supposed to know that what you brought is real? Isn't it really something else? 
#L0##b Dang, how did I get caught. Well... how about 100 mesos for a Red Potion?
#L1# Wat, how did you know? Well... this is actually a leaf of transformation where you won't be able to tranform at all...! 
#L2# Well... don't tell anyone, but... I'm actually a monster... but I took it, and look at me now. Isn't it amazing? You should take this as well...
What? You're a monster too? I see... well, your eyes did seem a little like that of a monster's... Okay, I feel like I can trust you now. I'll take your transformation leaf. Thanks!

Wait a minute, what's going on here? Why am I not turning into a human being? I just sniffed this, yet I'm still... me. Wait... is this... is this #t4031584#?! Did you just stop me from turning into human? You lied! How dare you!
What? How did you find out? My friends here won't let you leave, that's for sure!
Re...really? Well, I think you're a great person, but monsters and humans aren't meant for one another...
What? What part of my face screams deception? I am about as pure as one can get!
I see... it's okay. One day you'll find someone that'll look past your creepy looks.
...wait a minute, how did you know of my plans?
What are you saying? If you're really that bored, go talk to the game admin.
What? 100 mesos for a Red Potion? What a rip off! I am not buying anything from you!
I knew it. I knew something was weird when a human being came up to me to talk about something. I am not falling for your lies, so get out of here right now!
You haven't met up with #r#p9010012##k yet? Go find #b10 #t4031584#s#k and meet up with him, and remember, you really need to make it convincing, okay?
What's are you looking at? I don't like humans looking at me like that. You creep me out!
